statements: SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%infection%'
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY dob DESC
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE address <> 'Unknown'

SELECT patient_name, dob FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'COVID%';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE dob BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Appendicitis' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE prescription_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, frequency FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;

SELECT patient_name, prescription_date, medication_name FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id;

SELECT team_name, physician_lead FROM Research_Team ORDER BY team_name DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medical_Records.diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN Medical_Records ON Patients.patient_id = Medical_Records.patient_id WHERE Medical_Records.diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';

SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM Medical_Records GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender='Male';
SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.illness_description FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;

SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender='Female';
SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.illness_description FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY research_date ASC;
SELECT u.username, u.access_level, p.patient_name FROM user_access u JOIN patients p ON u.user_id = p.patient_id WHERE u.access_level >= 2;
SELECT * FROM research_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM research_sites ORDER BY location DESC;

SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage >= '100mg';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
